title: Flip the Solar Grid!
description: 🚀 Crisis! Someone was taking selfies 📱 near the control panel and knocked the solar array blueprint backwards ⇄! Now the panels face deep space instead of the Sun ☀️, and life support is failing! Study the before → after symbol grids to see the flip. Mirror today's entire grid left-to-right ↔️ to restore oxygen 💨 before time runs out ⏰!
hints: Think of the grid as being reflected in a mirror placed to the right side.
The first column becomes the last column, the second becomes the second-to-last, and so on.
The black square (⬛) reflects just like any other cell value.
